verbs.description: [ARG0: Sean Hannity] [V: has] [ARG1: just the plan to right the wrongs to the biggest victim of our justice system ever , Donald Trump : Let Hannity or Rush Limbaugh interview Trump instead of special counsel Robert Mueller] .
